BEEHIVE.description: When a bee is released from a beehive/bee nest

BREEDING.description: When an entity breeds to create a child, this also include Shulker and Allay

BUILD_IRONGOLEM.description: When an iron golem is spawned by being built

BUILD_SNOWMAN.description: When a snowman is spawned by being built

BUILD_WITHER.description: When a wither boss is spawned by being built

CHUNK_GEN.description:
Deprecated.
no longer called, chunks are generated with entities
 already existing.

COMMAND.description: When a creature is spawned by the "/summon" command

CURED.description: When a villager is cured from infection

CUSTOM.description: When a creature is spawned by plugins

DEFAULT.description: When an entity is missing a SpawnReason

DISPENSE_EGG.description: When a creature is spawned by a dispenser dispensing an egg

DROWNED.description: When a creature is spawned by another entity drowning

EGG.description: When a creature spawns from an egg

ENDER_PEARL.description: When an entity is spawned as a result of ender pearl usage

EXPLOSION.description: When eg an effect cloud is spawned as a result of a creeper exploding

FROZEN.description: When an entity is shaking in Powder Snow and a new entity spawns.

INFECTION.description: When a zombie infects a villager

JOCKEY.description:
When an entity spawns as a jockey of another entity (mostly spider
 jockeys)

LIGHTNING.description: When a creature spawns because of a lightning strike

METAMORPHOSIS.description: When a tadpole converts to a frog

MOUNT.description:
When an entity spawns as a mount of another entity (mostly chicken
 jockeys)

NATURAL.description: When something spawns from natural means

NETHER_PORTAL.description: When a creature is spawned by nether portal

OCELOT_BABY.description: When an ocelot has a baby spawned along with them

PATROL.description: When an entity is spawned as part of a patrol

PIGLIN_ZOMBIFIED.description: When a piglin is converted to a zombified piglin.

RAID.description: When an entity is spawned as part of a raid

REINFORCEMENTS.description: When an entity calls for reinforcements

SHEARED.description: When an cow is spawned by shearing a mushroom cow

SHOULDER_ENTITY.description:
When an entity is spawned as a result of the entity it is being
 perched on jumping or being damaged

SILVERFISH_BLOCK.description: When a silverfish spawns from a block

SPAWNER.description: When a creature spawns from a spawner

SPAWNER_EGG.description: When a creature spawns from a Spawner Egg

SPELL.description: When an entity is created by a cast spell.

TRAP.description: When an entity spawns as a trap for players approaching

VILLAGE_DEFENSE.description: When an iron golem is spawned to defend a village

VILLAGE_INVASION.description: When a zombie is spawned to invade a village
